per_frame_1=//zoom = sin(time);
per_frame_2=//warp = bass_att*.5;
per_frame_3=rot = sin(time) * .01;
per_frame_4=wave_g = treb_att * .1;
per_frame_5=wave_b = treb_att * .1;
per_frame_6=q1 = sin(time);
per_frame_7=q2 = cos(time);
per_frame_8=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float rateRand = .5;
warp_4=`    float ratePaint = (1-(mid_att*mid_att))*.05*(.5-rand_frame.x);
warp_5=`    float3 temp = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
warp_6=`    float2 myuv = float2( uv.x+((rad+.35)*sin(ang)*ratePaint)*temp.x, uv.y+((rad+.25)*cos(ang)*ratePaint)*temp.y);
warp_7=`    //ret = tex2D(sampler_fc_main, uv);
warp_8=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_fc_main, myuv);
warp_9=`    if(lum(ret) >= .2)
warp_10=`    {
warp_11=`        ret *= .99;
warp_12=`        ret -= 0.0005;
warp_13=`    }
warp_14=`    else if (lum(ret) <= (1-treb*.75))
warp_15=`    {
warp_16=`        ret *= .8;
warp_17=`    }
warp_18=`    else 
warp_19=`    {
warp_20=`        ret *= .75;
warp_21=`        ret.g += rand_frame.r / rateRand;
warp_22=`        ret.b += rand_frame.g / rateRand;
warp_23=`        ret.r += rand_frame.b / rateRand;
warp_24=`        
warp_25=`    }
warp_26=`    //ret *= .75 + (1 - rad * treb_att);
warp_27=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret *= saturate(bass_att) * GetBlur2(uv);
comp_5=`    //ret *= 1/bass_att; //gamma
comp_6=`    //ret *= 2.5;
comp_7=`    ret *= (rad*25*rad);
comp_8=`}
